snippet.title: City 20 - Official Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Get your first look at City 20, a new systems-driven simulation of a post-apocalyptic city from Italian developer Untold Games that reacts and adapts to your actions as you attempt to survive – perhaps a bit reminiscent of State of Decay, minus the zombies. Untold promises that no two playthroughs are the same. City 20 is in development for PC.

#IGN #Gaming #City20
